attributes.action: Stop child abuse and pornography HARSH sentences NEEDED. Stop these images!
attributes.additional_details:
Jon Venables recently discovered (under constant surveillance) with over 1000 images of child pornography - 1000 - what stuns me further is where these images come from! Who does this? Why is it happening? 
We need a deterrent - jail for a LONG time.
We need more action for these images to never hit the screens or ever made.
attributes.background:
I hear more and more stories of adults prying on young children, even children hurting and torturing other children, adults looking at child pornographing and when (and if) they get caught they receive minimal time in jail for punishment - if that.
We need tougher sentencing & removal of images.
